DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether ultrasound bone strength device ( Model Number : Oste-scan 500A ) effective safe measure calcaneal bone strength index human subject , compare list , similar device ( Model Number : SONOST3000 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Ultrasound Bone Strength Device Measure Calcaneal Bone Strength Index Human Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This study adopt method multicenter , open-labeled , self-paired design . Each subject randomly assign two different detective sequence group . In one group , investigator detect calcaneus subject experimental ultrasound bone strength device firstly control device . In another group , investigator detect calcaneus subject control ultrasound bone strength device firstly experimental device . Experimental ultrasound bone strength device develop Wuxi Huajian Hengchuang Medical Equipment Science Technology Co. , Ltd.. This device 's model number Oste-scan 500A report number Z-Y-2009-2014 , Z-E-0530-2014 ( G ) . Control ultrasound bone strength device clinical indication action mechanism experimental one , manufacture Osteosys Co. , Ltd.. This device 's model number SONOST3000 .
DOC.criteria: Subject need measure calcaneal bone strength index . Subject male female subject 2080 year age . Subject willing able provide sign dated write informed consent form . Subject whose compliance good cooperate complete clinical trial . Subject whose heel skin fester defect . Subject history allergic reaction ultrasonic couple agent . Subject cooperative obviously nervous extremely . Pregnant lactating female . Subject mental disease , without selfcontrol . Subject participate clinical trial within month .
